Text.Value: The curse gets deadlier the further you go in. But have no fear, boss. We've got a guide.
Speaking of power - go on and fetch that bone you threw.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Gronag] picks a bone off the ground and taunts the warg with it before throwing it offsceen <Greg>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadows and we lose sight of the beast. From the darkness we hear a growl, then a whimper, then a sickening crunch and a yelp as the beast is killed.
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The hyena chases the bone into the shadow curse and disappears into the darkness. After a moment you hear a growl, then a yelp and a *crunch* as the animal's killed (all out of sight).

Text.Value: Right you are. Go through and talk to Kansif - he's been waitin'.
Aye, in the shallows. But the curse don't care 'bout some itty bitty light once you get deeper. But don't worry, boss - we've got a guide.
Let's get moving then.
Don't worry boss, you're in good hands. We've got a guide.
Hey boy - yeh want the bone? Yeh want the bone?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena. The hyena bounces with excitement, ready to play fetch.
EditorData.NodeContext: Bends down and picks up a bone, which he waggles at a hyena.

Text.Value: I have power in spades, that's true - but it comes from me, not the Absolute.
Fetch!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The goblin yeets the bone into the shadows - the hyena turns run after it.
EditorData.NodeContext: Goblin throws the bone into the shadows

Text.Value: Chuckle.
*Whine.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Sad that the goblin is dead

Text.Value: Go on. Fetch.
You don't know? Oh, you're gonna soil yourself when you see him. But I won't spoil the surprise - that's for Kansif. Head on in.
Ha! Haha! Of course. Good one.
Ready when you are, True Soul. Anything you need.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little spooked by the player

Text.Value: Go on through and speak to Kansif. He's not as honey-tongued as me, mind.
You're the True Soul we're taking to Moonrise, I'm guessing?
One last thing - go and fetch the bone you threw.
Leave.
I take it you're the True Soul we're waiting on? Needs passage to Moonrise?
I meant it as a compliment, True Soul! No sweeter stink there is than that of power - yours, of course.

EditorData.NodeContext: charming, bit of a lick arse

Text.Value: Anything for a True Soul. Put in a good word for me at Moonrise, eh?
How do you plan on getting me through this cursed darkness?
Heh. Oi!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gronag spots the player and raises his crossbow. A beat, then he relaxes.

Text.Value: According to my notes, light should be sufficient to keep the curse at bay.
I thought light was enough to keep the curse at bay.
Argh! Hells - I near stained myself.
I was sent here by another goblin.
A guide? I know of no man nor beast that could traverse such darkness unaided.
Go on. Fetch.
Minthara sent me.
That's me.
Will do - thanks.
*You focus on the source of the power, but it is quiet and still. It needs to rest.*
Those who refuse me do not live for very long.
Now, eh... we'd best get goin', eh?

EditorData.NodeContext: very keen to get out of this conversation

Text.Value: Wait. You're... joking, yeah?
Just seeing if this shadow curse is as bad as they say. Word is it eats anyone gets too deep into the dark.
Refuse me again and I'll strike you down with the power of the divine.
Hah!
...I'll just go and, eh...
Heh. You see that blighter go? Swallowed whole by the shadow curse. Bet he was pure tasty.
What are you doing?
Besides - you got the stink of power on you. You learn to smell it, serving the Absolute.
Observe.
Talk to Kansif inside - he'll run through it.
Always nice to be appreciated.
But we're ready to go. You just need to tell Kansif inside.
Who else is gonna be wandering around in the dark?
So you want me to... I mean, I'll just-...

EditorData.NodeContext: Hesitant, looking for a way out

Text.Value: Relax. Just poking a little fun.
Why would you just assume that?
That'd be Rizzle. Huh. Thought she'd be back by now. Oh well.

EditorData.NodeContext: knows rizzle is likely dead. Doesn't care

Text.Value: ...No - no! ARGH!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Walks into the darkness. Pause - then screams.
EditorData.NodeContext: Being killed off-screen by creepy shadows

EditorData.stateContext: Goblin holding a bone to throw for the hyena, like a dog-and-master

Text.Value: Shoot him a knife-glare: you are worse than the shadows.
Stay quiet. Let the wretched thing live.

Synopsis: The player approaches a goblin camp. Three goblins and a yena are huddled around a campfire, warily watching the shifting shadows. As you step into the light, one of the goblins steps forward to greet you. You can ask him about the shadowy environs, and he will demonstrate the shadow-curse by killing the hyena.
